name: migrationmaker
description: Ferramenta para facilitar migrações de bancos diferentes

scripts.migrate: mysql -u root -proot -e 'drop database if exists test; drop server if exists portalLink; create database test;' && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.migrate:production: mysql -u root -proot -e 'drop database if exists isp_dev; drop server if exists portalLink; create database isp_dev;' && NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:seed:all

author: Bruno Sartori <brunosartori.webmaster@gmail.com>
